# CMA Final - Group I

Group I covers **advanced finance**, **law**, and **taxation**.

## What You Will Learn

- **Corporate Laws** - Advanced compliance
- **Strategic Finance** - Financial management
- **Direct Tax** - Advanced taxation
- **Strategic Cost** - Cost management

## Group I Papers

| Paper | Subject |
|-------|--------|
| 13 | Corporate Laws & Compliance |
| 14 | Strategic Financial Management |
| 15 | Strategic Cost Management |
| 16 | Direct Tax Laws |

slides.title: Strategic Financial Management
slides.content:
# Financial Strategy

## Investment Decisions

| Method | Criterion |
|--------|----------|
| NPV | > 0 Accept |
| IRR | > CoC Accept |
| Payback | < Target |
| PI | > 1 Accept |

## Cost of Capital

```
WACC = (E/V x Ke) + (D/V x Kd)

Ke = Cost of equity
Kd = After-tax cost of debt
```

## Capital Structure

- Optimal structure
- Financial leverage
- M&M theory

slides.title: Portfolio Management
slides.content:
# Investment Portfolio

## CAPM

```
Ke = Rf + beta(Rm - Rf)

Rf = Risk-free rate
beta = Systematic risk
Rm = Market return
```

## Portfolio Theory

| Concept | Meaning |
|---------|--------|
| Diversification | Risk reduction |
| Efficient frontier | Optimal portfolios |
| Beta | Market sensitivity |

## Valuation

- DDM (Dividend discount)
- P/E multiples
- DCF analysis

slides.title: Direct Tax Advanced
slides.content:
# Corporate Taxation

## Tax Rates

| Company | Rate |
|---------|------|
| Domestic | 25% + surcharge |
| New manufacturing | 15% |
| Foreign | 40% |

## MAT

```
Minimum Alternate Tax
18.5% of book profit

Payable if normal tax < MAT
```

## Carry Forward

| Loss | Period |
|------|--------|
| Business | 8 years |
| Capital | 8 years |
| House property | 8 years |

slides.title: Business Valuations
slides.content:
# Valuation Methods

## Approaches

| Approach | Methods |
|----------|--------|
| Income | DCF, Capitalized earnings |
| Market | Comparables, multiples |
| Asset | Book value, liquidation |

## DCF Valuation

```
Value = Sum of PV of FCF + Terminal value

Terminal = FCF(1+g) / (WACC - g)
```

## Due Diligence

- Financial
- Legal
- Operational
- Commercial
